page.title: 17THE OLDEST INHABITANT
page.content: Mr. Middleton is{93}and is the oldest inhabitant. He lives at 12, Drayton Rd He has spent part of his life serving in the{Army;}he has lots of medals to show for it. He gets up at half-past six. He gets himself a drink and then has some breakfast and gets dressed. He has a shave and then washes all the breakfast things. After that he has a drink of coffee and gets his dinner ready; then he watches sport and the news on{television,}which are his favourite programmes. He then has a sleep until about half-past four. He then gets his tea ready and watches television until he goes to bed at 11 o'clock. Apart from going to the Post Office at Hodnet, for his{pension,}he seldom goes out. Annabel Ruth Dyson aged 11 yrs 4 mths. 21.5.85
